Show message bubbles on one side only: Show message bubbles on one side only
Show message bubbles depending on the wi: Show message bubbles depending on the width either on both sides or only on one side
Show people and rooms in a combined list: Show people and rooms in a combined list
Do you want to join a room notifying you: Do you want to join a room notifying you about new releases? This is especially useful if your platform doesn't support automatic updates for SchildiChat (e.g. Windows and macOS).
All rooms you're in will appear in Home.
If disabled, you can still add Direct Me: If disabled, you can still add Direct Messages to Personal Spaces. If enabled, you'll automatically see everyone who is a member of the Space.
Show notification badges for People in S: Show notification badges for People in Spaces
Return to the room previously opened in: Return to the room previously opened in a space
If disabled, the space overview will be: If disabled, the space overview will be shown when switching to another space.
Compact: tiny avatar together with name: Compact: tiny avatar together with name and preview in one line
Intermediate: medium sized avatar with s: Intermediate: medium sized avatar with single-line preview
Roomy: big avatar with two-line preview: Roomy: big avatar with two-line preview
Home is useful for getting an overview o: Home is useful for getting an overview of everything. Keep in mind that disabling it could leave you unable to see certain rooms.
Schildi: Softer sounds for reduced anxie: Schildi: Softer sounds for reduced anxiety
Classic: The same sharp sounds as Elemen: Classic: The same sharp sounds as Element
